title: How do i fix "Repair not repairing" glitch?
body: Hi, when i started playing LoL i used the old launcher (it was normal like the new when i ran it, but i had to update it, but that is not the problem), now i have to run the new launcher because i cannot use it, so whenever i open the new launcher, it says "Repairing" and when it is almost full, then it goes to start, over and over and over, please help!!!!

replies.body: It may be running into some unrepairable files or possibly just taking a bit to finish up. If you don't see any errors, then just let it finish up, but if it keeps crashing or otherwise not working properly go ahead and grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall**. That should be able to clean up any still damaged files and get the client working normally again.
